name: cloc
description: An npm module for distributing cloc by Al Danial http://cloc.sourceforge.net/

scripts.release: with-package git commit -am pkg.version && with-package git tag pkg.version && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta: npm run release && npm run tag:beta
scripts.tag:beta: with-package npm dist-tag add pkg.name@pkg.version beta
